attributes.action: should give a priority for older asylum case /as  looking  under legacy policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: home office should give priority for old asylum case these is my concern, regard to the legacy policy that have been set out to resolve the all asylum case before 2011, some people here on this country without any freedom more then 10 years, home office should give them a priority not only for familys and  who has a childrent what will happent someone not able to have children. if someone has been here for long they frustrated goes made they might have to go elsewhere for have some relax, it not nice for ignore older asylum case and grant someone who came this country recently
